Title: A Perfect World
Actors: Kevin Costner, Clint Eastwood, Laura Dern, T.J. Lowther
Plot: Kidnapped boy Phillip Perry (T.J. Lowther) strikes up a friendship with his captor Butch Haynes (Kevin Costner): an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search is headed up by honorable Texas Ranger "Red" Garrett (Clint Eastwood).
